title: Ticket #2793: Download index should list contrib modules
description:
http://research.cs.wisc.edu/condor/downloads-v2/download.pl Currently says:

  If you are looking for the view client or the log viewer then you can find them here. There is also a sporadic collection of older contrib modules for various things if you have an older release of Condor.

This is easy to overlook, and fails to enumerate what is actually in the Contrib area at the moment, notably omitting the DMTCP/Condor integration. We could just modify download.pl to have a more up to date list, but it would likely drift from reality over time.

Proposed: The list of Contrib packages has always been short. Just generate the full list and include it there.
remarks:
2012-May-07 16:35:59 by jfrey:
Check-in [31940] actually belongs to #2973.
